message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a high-value product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $12,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  I'm willing to offer $10,500 for the product.  This is a fair price considering your own valuation.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm not quite ready to accept $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.
